decks.notes: This Golgari Aggro deck focuses on utilizing efficient removal spells and disruption to control the board while maintaining pressure with a mix of powerful creatures. The deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan with cards like Thoughtseize and Go for the Throat, while also presenting threats like Mosswood Dreadknight and Graveyard Trespasser to quickly close out the game. Vraska, Golgari Queen and Liliana of the Veil provide additional value and utility, making it a versatile and aggressive deck that can adapt to different matchups.

This Red Deck Wins aggro deck focuses on fast and efficient damage dealing. It includes low-cost creatures like Monastery Swiftspear and Ghitu Lavarunner, along with burn spells like Skewer the Critics and Wizard's Lightning to target opponent's creatures or go directly to the face. The deck also utilizes land cards like Ramunap Ruins and Den of the Bugbear for additional damage. Additionally, cards like Slickshot Show-Off and Kumano Faces Kakkazan provide extra synergy and options for dealing damage. This deck aims to quickly overwhelm the opponent and secure victory before they can stabilize.

The main idea of this Mono Black Control deck is to disrupt the opponent's game plan through a combination of hand disruption cards like Duress and Thoughtseize, removal spells like Fatal Push and Go for the Throat, and disruption cards like Go Blank and Waste Not. The deck aims to control the board and the opponent's resources while generating card advantage with cards like Liliana of the Veil and Geier Reach Sanitarium. Sheoldred, the Apocalypse and Sheoldred's Edict provide additional ways to control the board, while the lands help to fix mana and provide utility.

This deck focuses on controlling the opponent's board and hand through counterspells, removal spells, and card draw. The deck aims to slow down the opponent's game plan while setting up its own win conditions through cards like Teferi, Hero of Dominaria and Memory Deluge. The inclusion of Kaheera, the Orphanguard as a companion adds an extra layer of synergy and flexibility to the deck. Overall, the key concept of this UW Control deck is to maintain control of the game from start to finish, overwhelming the opponent with powerful spells and strategic plays.

The deck focuses on utilizing aggressive spirit creatures to quickly overwhelm the opponent. By utilizing cards like Mausoleum Wanderer, Supreme Phantom, and Spell Queller, the deck aims to control the board while dealing consistent damage. Defensive cards like Skyclave Apparition and Mutavault provide additional protection and versatility. The deck also includes spells like No More Lies and Spell Pierce to disrupt the opponent's strategy. Overall, the deck aims to establish early board presence and pressure the opponent into making unfavorable trades, ultimately leading to victory through aggressive gameplay.

The deck focuses on utilizing the synergies between cards like Amalia Benavides Aguirre, Collected Company, and Wildgrowth Walker to create a powerful life gain combo. By assembling the right pieces and maximizing the value of each card, players can generate massive amounts of life gain and use Aetherflux Reservoir to deal lethal damage to opponents. The inclusion of cards like Extraction Specialist and Return to the Ranks provide additional utility and resilience to the combo strategy, making it a formidable force in Pioneer 1 vs 1 matches.

This Gruul Aggro deck focuses on fast and aggressive plays with low-cost creatures and burn spells to quickly overwhelm the opponent. By playing efficient creatures like Monastery Swiftspear and Burning-Tree Emissary alongside powerful burn spells like Play with Fire and Atarka's Command, the deck aims to deal a large amount of damage early in the game. Additionally, the inclusion of cards like Kumano Faces Kakkazan and Aloe Alchemist provide added versatility and reach to close out games efficiently. The mana base is optimized to support a fast and consistent aggressive strategy.

This Rakdos Aggro deck focuses on quickly building a board presence and applying pressure to the opponent, utilizing cards like Monastery Swiftspear, Emberheart Challenger, and Heartfire Hero to deal damage efficiently. With a mix of pump spells like Titan's Strength and Claim / Fame, along with burn spells like Kumano Faces Kakkazan and Sulfurous Springs, the deck aims to close out games swiftly before opponents can stabilize. The inclusion of Jegantha, the Wellspring as a companion adds additional versatility and consistency to the deck's strategy.
